alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 3:45PM CDT until March 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. .Ongoing snow melt has contributed to river rises in the Forest River. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Left bank flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 6.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
